data.text: Kik nyiego maki gi joricho
nimar chunjegi chano timo mamono
Rieko ema igerogo ot,
kuom ngʼeyo, utene maiye ipongʼo gi gik moko
Ngʼat mariek nigi teko maduongʼ;
nimar dhiyo e lweny dwaro ni ongʼadni rieko,
Rieko bor moyombo ngʼat mofuwo;
Ngʼat machano gima rach
Andhoga mar fuwo en richo,
Ka tekri orumo mipodho e kinde mar lweny,
Res jogo mitero kar tho;
Ka iwacho niya, “Ne ok wangʼeyo gimoro kuom wachni,”
Wuoda, cham mor kich, nimar ober;
Ngʼe bende ne rieko mit ni chunyi;
Kik ibut ka ngʼat marach mondo iketh od ngʼat makare,
kata bedni ngʼat makare ogore piny nyadibiriyo,
Kik ibed mamor gi masiche mag jasiki,
nimar Jehova Nyasaye biro neno
Kik ibed maluor nikech joricho
nimar jaricho onge gi geno mar ndalo mabiro,
Wuoda, luor Jehova Nyasaye kod ruoth morito piny,
nimar ji ariyogo biro kelonegi chandruok apoya nono,
Magi bende gin weche mag jomariek:
Ngʼatno mowachone jaketho niya, “In kare ionge ketho”
To nobed maber gi jogo makumo joma oketho,
Dwoko maratiro
Tiek tijeni ma oko kendo ik puothegi;
Kik ibed janeno e wach jabuti
Kik iwach niya, “Abiro timone mana kaka osetimona;
Nakadho but puoth jasamuoyo,
kudho notwi kuonde duto,
Naketo chunya nono gino mane aneno
Nindo matin, ayula wangʼ matin,
to dhier biro monji ka janjore
